name: Planet Trade Organization
startIntroPart1: Lord Frieza, we have encountered this planet full of life. command us to victory, our galactic emperor...
declaringWar: Shall we begin this spectacle of horror?
attacked: It’s Been So Long Since I Felt Pain. It’s Such A Strange Sensation.
introduction: I Doubt I Need An Introduction, But Just In Case, I Am The Mighty Frieza... And Yes, All The Horrible Stories You’ve Heard Are True.
afterPeace: i'm more merciful than I appear.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.

name: Red Ribbon Army
startIntroPart1: Commander Red, This is General Fandango reporting. We will start a Base somewhere in this Deserted Area to find the dragon balls, even if they are in here. Dragon Balls aside, we will destroy whatever is in the way of our goal. you may wish me luck.
startIntroPart2: This is an overpowered joke nation just as an example for the mods feature. Set Phasers to Obliterate!!
declaringWar: You dare to spit on us?! Prepare for bloodshed...
defeated: Mission Failed... We will get them next time.
introduction: Hello, We are the Red Ribbon Army. If you wish for your survival, please don't try to fight and stay out of our way.
neutralHello: Private! we have a diplomatic visitor! DON'T PUT CYANIDE IN THE TEA, DAMN IT!!! Anyways... what are you up to?
hateHello: Hurry up and speak before I lose my patience.
hateNo: You gotta be fucking kidding me.
afterPeace: Yeah, you're right, this fighting is childish. we must warn you, do NOT get in the Red Ribbon's way.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.

name: Saiyan Empire
startIntroPart1: After the destruction of Planet Vegeta, we Saiyans have been looking for a planet that's suitable to reside in. and we found it. and I got a feeling that we have to start over... again...
declaringWar: You tread on the wrong grass, you bastard!
attacked: Damn it, We've got to fight back!
defeated: Well... time to find another planet...
introduction: As superior galactic entities, you are not worthy of our attention.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
